==Useful info==
A '''soldier ant''' is a hardier version of the [[worker ant]], with the same strengths and vulnerabilities, except that the soldier ant is tougher and of average speed.

==Tips and tricks==
*Poison works exceptionally well against them. [[Venom]]ous weapons and [[Poison Magic]] will kill them in short order, and [[Mephitic Cloud]] will turn them against each other.
*Their magic resistance is low, so you can confuse and paralyse them without too much trouble.
*As long as you have [[poison resistance]], facing them shouldn't be too much trouble, though they can still manage to mangle lightly armored spellcasters who let them get into close quarters.

==History==
* Soldier ants were removed in [[0.27]].
